subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Horses
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Four years after Barbaro soared into the public consciousness at the Kentucky Derby, his full brother Lentenor may be on his way to that same race.
snippet: Four years after Barbaro soared into the public consciousness at the Kentucky Derby, his full brother Lentenor may be on his way to that same race.
